title: UAW Officials Vote to Extend Nationwide GM Strike
text:
The United Auto Workers will continue to picket General Motors Co.’s U.S. factories until workers have approved a new labor deal, prolonging a costly nationwide strike that is already the company’s longest in decades.

In a rare step, a council of union-hall leaders meeting in Detroit voted to extend the walkout, in its 32nd day as of Thursday. The vote came after negotiators reached a tentative agreement with GM Wednesday for more than 46,000 UAW-represented workers at the company’s U.S. facilities. Typically, when bargainers...
description: The United Auto Workers will continue to picket GM’s U.S. factories until workers have approved a new labor deal, prolonging a costly nationwide strike that is already the company’s longest in decades.
